name: The Rose Bush
description:
NOTE: a bug fix has been implemented in the browser version,  the original upload is still avalible for download if you're interested in trying out the game in it's original state.

fixes: -player and clone afected by gravity if either enter a vine while jumping/falling

             -clone being able to climb outside vines if it died climbing a vine

             -flytrap hitbox adjusted to sprite size

Use Arrow keys to move  (Dpad on controller) and Space to Jump (A button on controller)

Art by:

Tyas "Zeblackcat" van Bergen  and Raquel "LeFonki" El Fakih

Code and Level design by:

Omar "Kegnor" El Fakih

Music from hmix.net by Hirozaku Akiyama
